column4: hello i have an lcd tv viewsonic model(n3252w) using an nividia card grforce mx4000  and i can only get clone mode with 800*600 resolution i tried changing xorg but it doesn t work help please
do you have the accelerated drivers enabled?  There is a good tool at /usr/share/applications/Screens and Graphics
then use that tool I pointed you to.  You'll have to navigate there within your desktop environment, because it's not seen on the command line.
you're welcome.  I wrestled and wrestled with getting my nvidia card working, until I found that tool.
